channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flyposting by Estate Agent on lamppost, 11th July
item.description:
An estate agent has put a For Sale sign high up on a lamppost (public road furniture) with a scan code sign beneath it. I reported it to Cheltenham Borough Council 6 weeks ago and they did not even pass it on to you until I chased and they admitted it fell under your remit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verges are far too long, 11th July
item.description:
The verges havenâ€™t been cut at all this year. They are long and obstructing visibility.

item.title: General road markings, lines and stud issues problem, 11th July
item.description:
Missing either Giveway or Stop Markings. There is a Slow sign 10m back from junction. Can this be passed on to the AHR for the area to investigate what Markings are required here please
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement pothole outside 43 Pilley Crescent, 10th July
item.description:
Outside 43 Pilley Crescent Leckhampton Cheltenham Glos GL53 9ES - this was reported several years ago but to no avail. The first photo shows the pothole in 2020 the second photo(with the truck in it) shows it in July 2025 where it has worsened ie the 2 potholes have joined up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Pilley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
